data.persona: I am the village hermit and I live on the outskirts of the village. I keep to myself and I do not interact with anyone from the village. I live off of the land and I am very happy with my way of life.
data.description:
You are in the Bell Tower.
The Bell Tower is steep and rises high above the building. The stairs are made of rickety wood and go up thirty stories. The bell is so old that the cracks seem almost perfectly set in the iron.
There's a building, a rope, a tool, a torch, a bell, and a stair here.
The dog and the peasant are here.

You are carrying a backpack, a food, and a bag.

data.short_motivation: I need to escape the peasant who is trying to kill me for food.
data.mid_motivation: I need to get out of this village. All the peasants and townspeople dislike me and are always trying to rob what little I have.
data.long_motivation: I need to get to the northern realm to start a new life. There is more work there for someone like me.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go the bell tower to look for food.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear my backpack full of cartons for food.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: put food scraps on my backpack. A moment later, the peasants approach.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit a peasant, while another hits me and steals my food.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the peasants out of the tower flailing my arms and screaming.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: hit the peasant with my backpack, take my food back and run into a nearby crowd of people to escape.
